result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: Do the books have to be printed in Ireland?

result.eng: I would like to welcome you to Ireland.

result.orig: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinn

result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roṁaiḃ go hÉirinnI would like to welcome you to Ireland.

result.eng: Ireland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.orig: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.html: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṫír ḃoċt í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.eng: It was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann
result.orig: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann

result.eng: Software made in Ireland.

result.eng: He returned to Ireland around Christmas.

result.eng: He left Ireland.

result.eng: However bad the unemployment rate in Ireland, it is worse in the Gaeltacht.

result.eng: An accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ga: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn

result.eng: I am from Poland originally but I live in Ireland now.
result.ga: Is as an Pholainn ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí in Éirinn anois
result.orig: Is as an Pholainn ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí in Éirinn anois

result.ponchtml: Is as an Ṗolainn ó ḋúċas mé aċ tá mé i mo ċónaí in Éirinn anoisI am from Poland originally but I live in Ireland now.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: She was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.

result.eng: She was on an early-morning flight to Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí sí ar eitilt mhochmhaidine ar ais go hÉirinn

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn

result.eng: I well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair aṁáinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga

result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
